comments.body: Why was this change needed? Implies that the existing tests don't cover the same underlying logic as before?

Because before we weren't using `nextFocus`, which requires the presence of a `DefautlFocusTraversal` widget in the tree in order to work (much like `Text` requiring a `Directionality`). I could make a separate wrap function for the test I added, or wrap the `wrap` call with a `DefaultFocusTraversal`, but it seemed harmless to add it to the base wrap function.
